sentences.en: Are you going to knuckle down?
He had a white - knuckle ride on a roller coaster.
sentences.cn: 他坐了一次令他胆战心惊的云霄飞车.

sentences.en: He served a braised knuckle of lamb for the main course.
sentences.cn: 他端上了一盘炖熟的羊膝作为主菜.

sentences.en: Her knuckles whitened as she gripped the gun.
sentences.cn: 她紧紧握着枪，指关节都发白了。

sentences.en: If that requires the use of knuckle tactics, so be it.
sentences.cn: 即使这需要使出“不戴拳套”的格斗战术, 也在所不惜.

sentences.en: In spite of every argument he obstinately refused to knuckle under.
sentences.cn: 尽管面对着一切论据,他顽固地拒不认输.

sentences.en: It is arguable whether the rebels will knuckle under.
sentences.cn: 还不能确定反叛者是否会投降。

sentences.en: Just knuckle down for an hour or so and finish.
sentences.cn: 花上个把钟头认真工作把事情做完吧.

sentences.en: Route sensor wire from steering knuckle to fender panel.
sentences.cn: 从转向节到防护板安排感知器导线走向.
斯洛特咬住一下指关节.

sentences.en: The Chinese people will not knuckle under in any circumstances.
sentences.cn: 中国人民在任何情况下都不会屈服.

sentences.en: The needle had broken the skin just above the knuckle.
sentences.cn: 针恰好刺破了指关节的上方皮肤.

sentences.en: The only thing to do was knuckle down and get on with some serious hard work.
sentences.cn: 唯一能做的就是开始努力工作，好好干出点儿成绩来。

sentences.en: They refused to knuckle under to any pressure.
sentences.cn: 他们拒不屈从任何压力.

sentences.en: We don't want anything near the knuckle, lad. There'll be ladies present.
sentences.cn: 小伙子,我们不想听任何粗俗的笑话. 这里在座的女士们.

sentences.en: We've got to knuckle down and clean the house.
sentences.cn: 我们得好好干了,把屋子打扫干净.

words.tran_cn: 慢速变化球（等于knuckle ball）；弹子（一种游戏）；水压机操作工
关节；[解剖]指关节；指节；膝关节；肘

phrases.tran_cn: 向外界压力作出让步；屈服
[口语](笑话等)近乎猥亵的，近乎下流的，近乎粗鄙的

trans.tran_cn: （指人）指关节，（指动物）膝关节，肘，铰结，肘形接，铜指节套
trans.tran_en: your knuckles are the joints in your fingers, including the ones where your fingers join your hands
